content: It was all pretty horrible from my side of the room looking at the eager and scared young faces looking back at me. I mostly coped by drawing Venn diagrams and those four grid things with cost and return quandrants…. mostly just to get high off the markers…. and wonder why nobody ever ate the damn doughnuts and bagels my secretary (I’m old, they were secretaries back then) had to get at 5am from some bakery cross town the CEO liked and we had to patronize.
